name: Tunnel Runner
description:
Tunnel Runner is a 3D maze game released by CBS Electronics in 1983 for the Atari 2600. It was programmed by Richard K. Balaska Jr.

Tunnel Runner is one of three games for the Atari 2600 featuring RAM Plus (the other two are Omega Race and Mountain King), where the cartridge itself contains an additional 256 bytes of RAM to supplement the console's 128 bytes.
